byline.contributor: John Eligon contributed reporting from Milwaukee.

abstract: Republican Presidential nominee Donald J Trump holds rally in West Bend, Wis, in front of nearly all-white crowd, at which he blames Democrats and his rival Hillary Clinton for violence and economic strife in black communities; Trump's law and order message includes vow to increase number of police officers patrolling city streets in poor and black neighborhoods.
lead_paragraph: Speaking in West Bend, Wis., Mr. Trump accused Hillary Clinton of complicity in violence against the police and blamed Democrats for the plight of black neighborhoods.
snippet: Speaking in West Bend, Wis., Mr. Trump accused Hillary Clinton of complicity in violence against the police and blamed Democrats for the plight of black neighborhoods....

headline.main: Trump, Rallying White Crowd for Police, Accuses Democrats of Exploiting Blacks
headline.print_headline: Trump Rallies White Crowd in Wisconsin for the Police
